attributes.action: Inland Revenue investigation on every MP expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HM Revenue and Custom in line with 480(2009) Expenses and benefits run investigate personally the expenses and benefits claimed by MP's. MP's cannot be judge differently from all other british citizens. I call for immediate stop of all claims by MP’s and for a  investigation to be set up by the Inland Revenue.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
